lines.line: A tiny kitten stands amid the ruins of its home, devastated by fire.
Growing up alone, the young cat wanders through burnt buildings, forever marked by tragedy.
Desperate to escape the flames, it leaps from a burning window.
The disaster leaves nothing but destruction in its wake.
Now grown, the cat spends its days staring through rainy windows, isolated from the world.
Eyes filled with sadness, it carries the weight of its painful memories.
Cautiously watching from corners, it struggles to trust again.
Wide-eyed and alert, it remains on guard even in safe spaces.
One day, a kind human offers a feather, a simple gesture of friendship.
Slowly, the cat begins to explore its surroundings again.
The human gently lifts the cat, offering warmth and security.
Trust builds as the cat experiences human affection.
Eventually, the cat meets another feline companion.
They form a bond through play and shared experiences.
Together they find joy in simple games.
Finally, the once-lonely cat discovers the comfort of companionship.

parsed_script.full_script: A tiny kitten stands amid the ruins of its home, devastated by fire. Growing up alone, the young cat wanders through burnt buildings, forever marked by tragedy. Desperate to escape the flames, it leaps from a burning window. The disaster leaves nothing but destruction in its wake. Now grown, the cat spends its days staring through rainy windows, isolated from the world. Eyes filled with sadness, it carries the weight of its painful memories. Cautiously watching from corners, it struggles to trust again. Wide-eyed and alert, it remains on guard even in safe spaces. One day, a kind human offers a feather, a simple gesture of friendship. Slowly, the cat begins to explore its surroundings again. The human gently lifts the cat, offering warmth and security. Trust builds as the cat experiences human affection. Eventually, the cat meets another feline companion. They form a bond through play and shared experiences. Together they find joy in simple games. Finally, the once-lonely cat discovers the comfort of companionship.
